title: Contributor Covenant Code of Conduct
text: members, contributors, leaders pledge make participation community harassment-free experience everyone, regardless age, body size, visible invisible disability, ethnicity, sex characteristics, gender identity expression, level experience, education, socio-economic status, nationality, personal appearance, race, religion, sexual identity orientation. pledge act interact ways contribute open, welcoming, diverse, inclusive, healthy community.

title: Contributor Covenant Code of Conduct
text: Examples behavior contributes positive environment community include: Demonstrating empathy kindness toward people respectful differing opinions, viewpoints, experiences Giving gracefully accepting constructive feedback Accepting responsibility apologizing affected mistakes, learning experience Focusing best just us individuals, overall community Examples unacceptable behavior include: use sexualized language imagery, sexual attention advances kind Trolling, insulting derogatory comments, personal political attacks Public private harassment Publishing others’ private information, physical email address, without explicit permission conduct reasonably considered inappropriate professional setting

title: Contributor Covenant Code of Conduct
text: Community leaders responsible clarifying enforcing standards acceptable behavior take appropriate fair corrective action response behavior deem inappropriate, threatening, offensive, harmful. Community leaders right responsibility remove, edit, reject comments, commits, code, wiki edits, issues, contributions aligned Code Conduct, communicate reasons moderation decisions appropriate.

title: Contributor Covenant Code of Conduct
text: Code Conduct applies within community spaces, also applies individual officially representing community public spaces. Examples representing community include using official e-mail address, posting via official social media account, acting appointed representative online offline event.

title: Contributor Covenant Code of Conduct
text: Instances abusive, harassing, otherwise unacceptable behavior may reported community leaders responsible enforcement [INSERT CONTACT METHOD]. complaints reviewed investigated promptly fairly. community leaders obligated respect privacy security reporter incident.

title: Contributor Covenant Code of Conduct
text: Community leaders follow Community Impact Guidelines determining consequences action deem violation Code Conduct:

title: Contributor Covenant Code of Conduct
text: Community Impact: Use inappropriate language behavior deemed unprofessional unwelcome community. Consequence: private, written warning community leaders, providing clarity around nature violation explanation behavior inappropriate. public apology may requested.

title: Contributor Covenant Code of Conduct
text: Community Impact: violation single incident series actions. Consequence: warning consequences continued behavior. interaction people involved, including unsolicited interaction enforcing Code Conduct, specified period time. includes avoiding interactions community spaces well external channels like social media. Violating terms may lead temporary permanent ban.

title: Contributor Covenant Code of Conduct
text: Community Impact: serious violation community standards, including sustained inappropriate behavior. Consequence: temporary ban sort interaction public communication community specified period time. public private interaction people involved, including unsolicited interaction enforcing Code Conduct, allowed period. Violating terms may lead permanent ban.

title: Contributor Covenant Code of Conduct
text: Community Impact: Demonstrating pattern violation community standards, including sustained inappropriate behavior, harassment individual, aggression toward disparagement classes individuals. Consequence: permanent ban sort public interaction within community.

title: Contributor Covenant Code of Conduct
text: Code Conduct adapted Contributor Covenant, version 2.0, available https://www.contributor-covenant.org/version/2/0/ code_of_conduct.html. Community Impact Guidelines inspired Mozilla’s code conduct enforcement ladder. answers common questions code conduct, see FAQ https://www.contributor-covenant.org/faq. Translations available https:// www.contributor-covenant.org/translations.

what: Create a Boostrap 4 dashboard header — argonDashHeader
title: Create a Boostrap 4 dashboard header — argonDashHeader
Create a Boostrap 4 dashboard header — argonDashHeader
code: argonDashHeader(   ...,   gradient = TRUE,   color = NULL,   separator = FALSE,   separator_color = "secondary",   bottom_padding = 4,   top_padding = 6,   background_img = NULL,   mask = FALSE,   opacity = 8,   height = 600 )

title: Create a Boostrap 4 dashboard header — argonDashHeader
text: ... element gradient Whether apply gradient effect. TRUE default. color Header color. See https://demos.creative-tim.com/argon-design-system/docs/foundation/colors.html. separator Header bottom separator. FALSE default. separator_color Separator color. "secondary" default. See https://demos.creative-tim.com/argon-design-system/docs/foundation/colors.html. bottom_padding Bottom padding. 4 default. top_padding Bottom padding. 6 default. background_img Background image url path. mask Whether add opacity mask header. FALSE default opacity Mask opacity. 0 8. mask TRUE. height Header height. 600px default. background image.

title: Create a Boostrap 4 dashboard header — argonDashHeader

code: argonDashPage(   title = NULL,   description = NULL,   author = NULL,   navbar = NULL,   sidebar = NULL,   header = NULL,   body = NULL,   footer = NULL )

title: Create a Boostrap 4 dashboard page — argonDashPage
text: title App title. description Dashboard purpose. author Dashboard author. navbar Bootstrap 4 dashboard navbar. sidebar Bootstrap 4 dashboard main sidebar. header Bootstrap 4 dashboard header (navbar). Useful hightlight elements print message. body Bootstrap 4 dashboard body wrapper. footer Bootstrap 4 dashboard footer.

title: Create a Boostrap 4 dashboard page — argonDashPage
Create a Boostrap 4 dashboard page — argonDashPage
code: if(interactive()){  library(shiny)  library(argonDash)   shiny::shinyApp(    ui = argonDashPage(),    server = function(input, output) {}  ) }

what: Create a Boostrap 4 dashboard sidebar — argonDashSidebar
title: Create a Boostrap 4 dashboard sidebar — argonDashSidebar
Create a Boostrap 4 dashboard sidebar — argonDashSidebar
code: argonDashSidebar(   ...,   dropdownMenus = NULL,   id,   brand_url = NULL,   brand_logo = NULL,   vertical = TRUE,   side = c("left", "right"),   size = c("s", "md", "lg"),   skin = c("light", "dark"),   background = "white" )

title: Create a Boostrap 4 dashboard sidebar — argonDashSidebar
text: ... element argonDashSidebar, argonSidebarMenu, argonSidebarItem, argonSidebarHeader argonSidebarDivider. dropdownMenus Slot dropdown menus. displayd large screens. id Unique sidebar id. brand_url Sidebar brand url brand_logo Sidebar brand logo vertical Whether display sidebar vertical mode. TRUE default. side Sidebar side: "right" "left". "left" default. size Sidebar size: "s", "md", "lg". "md" default. skin Sidebar skin. "light" default. background Sidebar background color. See https://demos.creative-tim.com/argon-design-system/docs/foundation/colors.html.

title: Create a Boostrap 4 dashboard sidebar — argonDashSidebar

code: argonInfoCard(   value,   title = NULL,   stat = NULL,   stat_icon = NULL,   description = NULL,   icon,   icon_background = "default",   hover_lift = FALSE,   shadow = FALSE,   background_color = NULL,   gradient = FALSE,   width = 3 )

title: Create a Boostrap 4 dashboard info card — argonInfoCard
text: value info card value. title info card title. stat info card stat value. stat_icon info card stat icon. Expect argonIcon icon. description info card stat description. icon info card icon. Expect argonIcon icon. icon_background info card icon background color. hover_lift Whether apply lift effect hover. FALSE default. compatible floating. shadow Whether apply shadow effect. FALSE default. background_color Card background color. NULL default. gradient Whether apply gradient effect card background. FALSE default. width info card width. 1 12.

what: Create a Boostrap 4 table container — argonTable
title: Create a Boostrap 4 table container — argonTable
Create a Boostrap 4 table container — argonTable
code: argonTable(   ...,   cardWrap = FALSE,   title = NULL,   headTitles,   dark = FALSE,   width = 12 )

title: Create a Boostrap 4 table container — argonTable
text: ... argonTableItems. cardWrap Whether wrap table card. FALSE default. title Card title . headTitles Table header names. Must length number argonTableItem argonTableItems. Set "" empty title field. dark Whether enable dark mode. FALSE default. width Table width. 12 default.

title: Create a Boostrap 4 table container — argonTable
Create a Boostrap 4 table container — argonTable
code: if (interactive()) {  library(shiny)  library(argonR)  library(argonDash)  shinyApp(   ui = argonDashPage(     navbar = argonDashNavbar(),      sidebar = argonDashSidebar(id = "mysidebar"),      header = argonDashHeader(),      body = argonDashBody(      argonTable(       headTitles = c(        "PROJECT",        "BUDGET",        "STATUS",        "USERS",        "COMPLETION",        ""       ),       argonTableItems(        argonTableItem("Argon Design System"),        argonTableItem(dataCell = TRUE, "$2,500 USD"),        argonTableItem(         dataCell = TRUE,          argonBadge(          text = "Pending",          status = "danger"         )        ),        argonTableItem(         argonAvatar(          size = "sm",          src = "https://image.flaticon.com/icons/svg/219/219976.svg"          )        ),        argonTableItem(         dataCell = TRUE,          argonProgress(value = 60, status = "danger")        ),        argonTableItem(         argonButton(          name = "Click me!",          status = "warning",          icon = "atom",          size = "sm"         )        )       )      )     ),      footer = argonDashFooter()   ),   server = function(input, output) { }  ) }

title: argonDash 0.3.0.9000
argonDash 0.2.0
argonDash 0.2.0
text: add support shinyapps.io, RStudio connect shiny server pro

title: argonDash 0.2.0
argonDash 0.2.0
text: add min-height body add argonTable(), argonTableItems() argonTableItem() add argonAvatars() argonAvatar() Fix #12: reduce vertical space brand logo menu items argonDashSidebar(). Thanks @ShixiangWang fix issue argonInfoCard() stat NULL fix #3 thanks @noahbishop: vertical FALSE argonDashSidebar(), navbar elements horizontally displayed, expected

title: argonDash 0.2.0
text: fix #21: icon_background default value argonInfoCard(). Thanks @tusharmajhi9 fix #20: Remove hardcoded stat parameter, leave user defined. Thanks @mkaranja fix #10: allow programmatically set value ‘stat’ argonInfoCard(). Thanks @Patrikios fix #2: argonDropdown() correctly render navbar

title: argonDash 0.2.0
text: order enable user choose shiny::icon() argonR::argonIcon(): - Change icon args argonDropNavItem(), argonSidebarItem() argonInfoCard() - remove icon_color arg argonSidebarItem() - stat_icon arg argonInfoCard() can use either icon() argonIcon()

title: argonDash 0.1.0
